column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A drunk driver hit a road divider at 9:20 pm on November 12
column4: along ------Norodom Blvd------.------The driver refused to stop at the scene
column5: and somehow managed to get 100 meters
column6: before pulling over.------When cops and reporters turned up
column7: he denied that he had even been in an accident
column9: and became angry with the reporters taking pictures of him. ------After the incident
column10: the city’s traffic police came to the scene and detained the driver and car to wait for a resolution.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/735163.html------
